messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.

I'd be happy to help you identify what city you're in! However, I'll need your current latitude and longitude coordinates to look up your location. 

You can usually find your coordinates by:
- Using your phone's GPS/location services
- Checking a maps app on your device
- Using your browser's location sharing feature

Once you provide me with your latitude and longitude, I can tell you what city you're in.
I don't know my current coordinates.

I understand! Here are a few ways you can find your current coordinates:

**On your phone:**
- iPhone: Go to Settings > Privacy & Security > Location Services > System Services > Significant Locations, or use the Compass app
- Android: Open Google Maps, tap the blue dot showing your location, and your coordinates will appear

**On your computer:**
- Go to Google Maps in your web browser
- Allow location access when prompted
- Right-click on the blue dot showing your location and select the coordinates that appear

**Other options:**
- Search "what are my coordinates" in Google (if location is enabled)
- Use any GPS or mapping app and look for a "current location" or coordinate display feature

Once you have your latitude and longitude numbers (they'll look something like 40.7128, -74.0060), just share them with me and I'll tell you what city you're in!
Could you try turning on my location service to figure it out?

I don't have the ability to access your device or turn on your location services. I can only work with information that you provide to me directly.

I can help you identify your city once you give me your latitude and longitude coordinates, but you'll need to find those coordinates yourself using your device. I can't remotely access your phone, computer, or any location services.

If you're able to find your coordinates using one of the methods I mentioned earlier (like checking Google Maps, your phone's GPS, etc.), just share those numbers with me and I'll be happy to tell you what city you're in!
Alright, I'll try to figure it out myself then. Thanks.

You're welcome! If you do manage to find your coordinates and want to know what city you're in, just come back and share them with me - I'll be happy to help look up your location. Good luck figuring it out!
